publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1562 Jim Hume: Closure of Pets’ Corner in Ayr—That the Parliament notes with deep regret the decision of South Ayrshire Council to close Pets’ Corner at Belleisle Park in Ayr; further notes the potential animal welfare implications of this closure; considers that the savings made from removing the modest yearly running costs of £67,000 could be found elsewhere in the budget; commends the Ayr Advertiser and local residents on their campaign to save the much loved attraction, and strongly urges South Ayrshire Council to seriously reconsider its decision for the benefit of the local community and the welfare of the animals.
